Reviews.Title: GW Security
Reviews.Author: Nick Y. Kenaya
Reviews.Content: I like it. Works very well, and I received on time. I recommend this company for reliability and fast service.

ProductInfo.Features:
Positive Temperature Coefficient (PTC), Auto Reset Fuse
PTC fuse protection for Circuit Short, High Voltage, and Over Current.
Consolidate all cameras power (12V, 18 port, 15A) to one central location.
Wall Mount Heavy Duty Metal Case. LED indicator for each power output.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security GWP1218-15A 18Ch 12 Volt 15 Amp (12V 18 Port 15A) Power Distribution Box for Security Camera CCTV DVR System - New Technology
